This has been resolved, for anyone wondering there was a problem with the gimbal plugin which has been fixed

I have been waiting a while for help on this and I would like the finally release the parts as this is the only thing holding me up so I'm coming to the general membership for help with this.

I am having trouble properly implementing km_gimbal. I am looking for help from people experienced in using this plugin. I created a separate gimbal transform. The gimbal works in game, I can't however limit it to a single axis. If I change yawGimbalRange = 0 it doesn't do anything, the engine still gimbals on both axis. If I change pitchGimbalRange = 0 it doesn't gimbal at all on any axis. I want to limit the gimbal to a single axis.

Here's what I have:


MODULE
{
        name = KM_Gimbal
	gimbalTransformName = gimbal
	debug = false
	yawGimbalRange = 12 (changing this does nothing)
	pitchGimbalRange = 12 (changing this limits all movement in every direction)
	enableRoll = true
}
